contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} {{TOCRight}} '''MMA''' commonly refers to: * [[Metropolitan Museum of Art]], a museum in New York City * [[Mixed martial arts]], a full contact combat sport '''MMA''' may also refer to: ==In business and commerce== * [[MacRobertson Miller Airlines]], a Western Australian airline that operated from 1934 into the 1980s * [[Maldives Monetary Authority]], a central bank * [[Malta Maritime Authority]], responsible for the operation of the ports in Malta * [[Manufacturer's Mutual Association]], an organization formed in 1902 to challenge the litigation of the fledgling automobile industry * [[Money market account]], a type of deposit account * [[Mobile marketing association]], a trade group established to lead the growth of mobile marketing and technologies * [[Montreal, Maine and Atlantic Railway]], a North American regional freight railroad * [[Mutuelles du Mans|Mutuelles du Mans Assurances]], a French insurance company ==In medicine== * [[Mastitis-metritis-agalactiae]], a disease in [[Suidae|sows]] * [[Maxillomandibular advancement]], a type of jaw surgery * [[Methylmalonic acidemia]], an autosomal genetic disorder * [[Middle meningeal artery]], a large artery supplying the [[dura mater]], often a source of an [[epidural hematoma]] * [[Monomelic amyotrophy]], a disease of the lower motor neurons ==In politics and religion== * [[Ma malakat aymanukum]], a reference in the Qur'an to slaves * [[Medicare Modernization Act]], an American Congressional act that enabled the creation of Medicare plans and health savings accounts * [[Muttahida Majlis-e-Amal]], a coalition of religious political parties in Pakistan ==In science and technology== * [[Manual metal arc welding]], a common arc welding method * [[Method of Moving Asymptotes]], method to solve structural optimization problem * [[Methyl methacrylate]], an organic compound * [[Methylmalonic acid]], a dicarboxylic acid * [[MIDI Manufacturers Association]], caretaker of the MIDI specification * [[Millimeter Array]], an American radio telescope project * [[Monomethylarsonic acid]] or MMA(V), an [[Organoarsenic chemistry|organic arsenic]] compound * [[Monomethylarsonous acid]] or MMA(III), an [[Organoarsenic chemistry|organic arsenic]] compound * [[Multimission Maritime Aircraft]] or ''P-8 Poseidon'', a current US Navy program * [[Multi-path Management API]], allows an application to discover multipath devices * [[Tecnam MMA]], a twin-engine aircraft * [[3-Methoxy-4-methylamphetamine]], an entactogen and psychedelic drug of the phenethylamine and amphetamine classes ==In schools== * [[Maine Maritime Academy]], a US public college, Castine, Maine * [[Marine Military Academy]], a boarding school based on the United States Marine Corps, Harlingen, Texas * [[Marmion Military Academy]], a Benedictine boarding school in Aurora, Illinois * [[Massachusetts Maritime Academy]], a US state college, Buzzards Bay, Massachusetts * [[Missouri Military Academy]], a boarding school in Mexico, Missouri * [[Moscow Medical Academy]], a medical educational institution, Moscow, Russia {{disambig}}
